allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Switch to OpenRouter GPT-4o-mini and improve prompts

- Switch from Groq \(decommissioned vision models\) to OpenRouter
- Use GPT-4o-mini for reliable, cheap vision analysis
- Improve prompts for more varied slop scores \(not always 50%\)
- Add calibration examples for scoring consistency
- Require quoting exact phrases from pages
- Make feedback more actionable with specific suggestions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
